summary: Detective Michael Shayne and his girlfriend Joanne are on their way to be married when a scream from a nearby hotel room draws his attention to a pair of theatrical murders.
cast: Lloyd Nolan|Mary Beth Hughes|Sheila Ryan|William Demarest|Ben Carter|Virginia Brissac|Erwin Kalser|Henry Daniell|Dick Rich|Milton Parsons|Charles Arnt|Charles Trowbridge|Hamilton MacFadden|May Beatty|Charles C. Wilson|Mantan Moreland|Robert Strange|William 'Billy' Benedict|Don Brodie|John Butler|Kernan Cripps|John Dilson|Sam Finn|Jack Gargan|Otto Han|Tom Monk|Bert Moorhouse|Lee Murray|Spec O'Donnell|Nestor Paiva|Catherine Price|Brick Sullivan|Harry Tyler|Minerva Urecal|Emmett Vogan
title: Dressed to Kill
